subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Five U.S. Ryder Cup team members finished in the bottom 11 of the Tour Championship field. Billy Horschel, who is not on the squad, finished first to win the FedEx Cup title.
snippet: Five U.S. Ryder Cup team members finished in the bottom 11 of the Tour Championship field. Billy Horschel, who is not on the squad, finished first to win the FedEx Cup title.
